title: PA in Denver! #92Noon
description: PA broadcasting from iHeart family member KOA in Denver! Florio starts, Ryan Harris finishes the first hour...Voice of US Bank Stadium Alan Roach midway thru....final hour features some Vikings/Seahawks nostalgia, and Softy from Seattle closes the show!
